Title: A Radiant Echo
Description: <Within your hand, you hold a small Azerite sphere. Its light is steady and bright, but the sound it emits is plaintive and longing. It tugs at you, ever so slightly.>
ObjectivesText: Bring the Radiant Echo to a Worldsoul Memory, then release it.
RewardText: <As you release the Radiant Echo, visions of the past materialize before your eyes. The Worldsoul herself is sharing her memories with you.>
